externalLinkModal.title: Open External Link
externalLinkModal.description: This link will open in your browser. Please make sure it's a trusted link before proceeding.

auth.logoutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.
auth.invalidVArchiveUserInfo: Invalid user information. Please select the login data (account.txt) file created by the V-ARCHIVE official client.
auth.vArchiveServerError: An error occurred while connecting to the V-ARCHIVE server.
auth.vArchiveLoginFailed: V-ARCHIVE login failed. Please try again.
auth.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
auth.discordLoginFailed: Discord login failed. Please try again.
auth.announcement_1: RACLA collects and uses user data from V-ARCHIVE and Discord.
auth.announcement_2: Some DJMAX RESPECT V services will not be available if your V-ARCHIVE account is not linked.
auth.announcement_3: When you first log in with V-ARCHIVE or Discord, a RACLA account is automatically created and linked to the corresponding service account.
auth.announcement_4: You can check linking settings on the settings page after logging in.

update.updateAvailable: V{{version}} update is being processed. Please check your Windows taskbar - notification area.
update.downloaded: App restart required to apply V{{version}} update.
